name: Night of The Living Date
description:
Try to have a date while being barraged by zombies from every corner. While protecting yourself, you have to remember to answer the questions with the 1 and 2 keys on your keyboard.

Game has been created in 3 days during a game Jam.

Credits Group 18:

Artists:

Matilda M - NL

Theresa A - SE

Bram H - NL

Programmers:

Linus J - SE

Elmar K - NL

Jari v/d K - NL
